name: Area 51 (itch) (Making Enemies, albpb2, Ayo Making Enemies)
name_original: Area 51 (itch) (Making Enemies, albpb2, Ayo Making Enemies)
description:
Nevada Desert, 1970. You are a trained agent with one important mission: raid into a Bunker situated in the Area 51 and stop the activation of the deadliest weapon on Earth. To do it, you will have to go down to reach the main computer.

But it won’t be that easy: the security system will be active the moment you set a foot in the Bunker so you will have to type a code (pressing E) every 10 secs in the control monitors  you’ll find in your way. If you don’t do it on time, the system will kill you.

🎮🕹️ GAMEPLAY 🎮🕹️

🖥️ Press E in the nearest computer before the timer gets to 0 to avoid dead.

3️⃣ You can only press E when there is less than 3 sec left.

🔴Activate all the computers in the area to open the door and access the next level.

🔫 Kill the enemies you find in your way.
